## Facade.persist property

Cache webpack builds to the filesystem.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
persist: persist;
```

## Example 1


```js
app.persist('memory')
```

## Example 2


```js
app.persist('filesystem')
```

## Example 3


```js
app.persist(false)
```
